title: Readout of National Security Advisor Jake Sullivan’s Call with Brazilian National Security Advisor Ambassador Celso Amorim | The White House
content: National Security Advisor Jake Sullivan spoke today with National Security Advisor Ambassador Celso Amorim of Brazil. They discussed a number of bilateral and global issues, including Russia’s war against Ukraine, continued cooperation to combat climate change and protect the environment, the G20, and our shared efforts to safeguard democratic institutions.  ###
